DOC.brief_summary: The study open , prospective , single-site study 16 patient suffer fecal incontinence include . Change fecal incontinence episode intersphincteric injection NASHA/Dx gel 4x2 ml retreatment 4x2 ml 4 week measure .
DOC.brief_title: Pilot Study NASHA/Dx Gel Fecal Incontinence
DOC.criteria: 1 . Fecal incontinence least 2 episodes/week 2 . Symptom duration least one year 3 . Failed attempt conservative therapy 4 . Age 1880 5 . Written inform consent 6 . Available followup 7 . Fully compliant protocol 1 . Active inflammatory bowel disease 2 . Total external sphincter defect ultrasound clinical examination 3 . Bleeding diathesis anticoagulant therapy 4 . Rectal prolapse intussusception 5 . Present anal sepsis 6 . Anorectal implant 7 . Recent anorectal surgery ( within 6 month ) 8 . Rectal anastomosis 9 . Pregnancy , postpartum ( one year ) breast feeding
